info.title: OpenPix
info.description: A OpenPix é uma Plataforma de Gestão de Pagamentos. Para utilizar nossa API você deve acessar  __[https://api.openpix.com.br/](https://api.openpix.com.br/)__ e somente o mesmo. A OpenPix não aceita subdominios para a API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: charge ID or correlation ID. You will need URI encoding if your correlation ID has characters outside the ASCII set or reserved characters (%, \#, /).

id.description: the id previously informed to be found and deleted

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://api.openpix.com.br//api/openpix/v1/charge/%7Bid%7D \
  --header 'Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://api.openpix.com.br//api/openpix/v1/charge/%7Bid%7D",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "DELETE",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("api.openpix.com.br")

headers = { 'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE" }

conn.request("DELETE", "//api/openpix/v1/charge/%7Bid%7D", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://api.openpix.com.br//api/openpix/v1/charge/%7Bid%7D"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("DELETE", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://api.openpix.com.br//api/openpix/v1/charge/%7Bid%7D")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Delete.new(url)
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

parameters.name: return_existing
parameters.description: Make the endpoint idempotent, will return an existent charge if already has a one with the correlationID

post.description: Endpoint to create a new Charge for a customer

requestBody.description: Data to create a new charge

200.description: Charge ID and also the generated Dynamic BR Code to be rendered as a QRCode

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url 'https://api.openpix.com.br//api/openpix/v1/charge?return_existing=SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE' \
  --header 'Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"correlationID":"string","value":0,"comment":"string","identifier":"string","expiresIn":0,"customer":{"name":"string","email":"string","phone":"string","taxID":"string"},"additionalInfo":[{"key":"string","value":"string"}]}'

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://api.openpix.com.br//api/openpix/v1/charge?return_existing=SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"correlationID\":\"string\",\"value\":0,\"comment\":\"string\",\"identifier\":\"string\",\"expiresIn\":0,\"customer\":{\"name\":\"string\",\"email\":\"string\",\"phone\":\"string\",\"taxID\":\"string\"},\"additionalInfo\":[{\"key\":\"string\",\"value\":\"string\"}]}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "Authorization: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("api.openpix.com.br")

payload = "{\"correlationID\":\"string\",\"value\":0,\"comment\":\"string\",\"identifier\":\"string\",\"expiresIn\":0,\"customer\":{\"name\":\"string\",\"email\":\"string\",\"phone\":\"string\",\"taxID\":\"string\"},\"additionalInfo\":[{\"key\":\"string\",\"value\":\"string\"}]}"

headers = {
    'content-type': "application/json",
    'Authorization': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

conn.request("POST", "//api/openpix/v1/charge?return_existing=SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://api.openpix.com.br//api/openpix/v1/charge?return_existing=SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"correlationID\":\"string\",\"value\":0,\"comment\":\"string\",\"identifier\":\"string\",\"expiresIn\":0,\"customer\":{\"name\":\"string\",\"email\":\"string\",\"phone\":\"string\",\"taxID\":\"string\"},\"additionalInfo\":[{\"key\":\"string\",\"value\":\"string\"}]}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://api.openpix.com.br//api/openpix/v1/charge?return_existing=SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request["Authorization"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
request.body = "{\"correlationID\":\"string\",\"value\":0,\"comment\":\"string\",\"identifier\":\"string\",\"expiresIn\":0,\"customer\":{\"name\":\"string\",\"email\":\"string\",\"phone\":\"string\",\"taxID\":\"string\"},\"additionalInfo\":[{\"key\":\"string\",\"value\":\"string\"}]}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

post.description:
As a partner company, you can create a new application to some of your companies.
The application should give access to our API to this companies, so they can use
it too.

requestBody.description: The request body to create a pre registration.

name.description: The name you want to give your application

Our "idempotence output", if you get this HTTP code, it's an application
that already has been registered.

201.description:
A new application has been registered. It'll be identified by the name that you give to it
and by the company that has been referenced.

403.description: You are unauthorized to use this endpoint.

brCode.description: EMV BRCode to be rendered as a QRCode

correlationID.description: Your correlation ID to keep track of this charge

paymentLinkID.description: Payment Link ID, used on payment link and to retrieve qrcode image

paymentLinkUrl.description: Payment Link URL to be shared with customers

transactionID.description: unique uuid used as the txid from Pix into the provider from your openpix account. This field link the charge with the transaction when paid.

correlationID.description: Your correlation ID to keep track of this charge

value.description: Value in cents of this charge

comment.description: Comment to be added in infoPagador

expiresIn.description: Expires the charge in seconds (minimum is 15 minutes)

correlationID.description: Your correlation ID to keep track of this refund

refundId.description: Unique refund ID for this pix refund

transactionEndToEndId.description: Your transaction ID, or endToEnd ID, to keep track of this refund

correlationID.description: Your correlation ID, unique identifier refund

event.description: The event to listen to. If omitted, the webhook will be registered to listen the OPENPIX:TRANSACTION_RECEIVED. Event called when a new pix transactions is received

WebhookEventEnum.description:
Available events to register a webhook to listen to. If no one selected anyone the default event will be OPENPIX:TRANSACTION_RECEIVED.

* **OPENPIX:CHARGE_CREATED** - New charge created
* **OPENPIX:CHARGE_COMPLETED** - Charge completed is when a charge is fully paid
* **OPENPIX:CHARGE_EXPIRED** - Charge expired is when a charge is not fully paid and expired
* **OPENPIX:TRANSACTION_RECEIVED** - New PIX transaction received
* **OPENPIX:TRANSACTION_REFUND_RECEIVED** - New PIX transaction refund received or refunded

End.title: End Date
End.description: End date used in the query. Complies with RFC 3339.

Start.title: Start Date

ApplicationEnumTypePayload.description: Type of the application that you want to register. Each of this has some kind of permissions.

taxID.description: The tax identifier of your account holder. This should be a raw string with only digits.

firstName.description:
The user's first name.
If the pre registration has been approved, this will be turn the company's first user first name.

lastName.description:
The user's last name.
If the pre registration has been approved, this will be turn the company's first user last name.

email.description:
The user's email.
It'll be the email that will entered in contact to validate that it's a real person (it's a step to approve the preregistration).
After approving the preregistration, it'll be the company's user email.

phone.description:
The user's phone number, need to be a validated phone number because it'll receive a SMS confirming that is a real person.
We're accept only values that matches the E.164 standard, that follows this pattern: [+][country code][local phone number].

name.description: The name of this preregistration. It'll be related as your company name too.

website.description: A website that is related to this preregistration.

clientId.description: The client ID from the company bank account that is related to this preregistration/company.

id.description: The ID of the company that is related to this preregistration.

name.description: The name of the company that is related to this preregistration.
When the preregistration will turn a company, this will be the name of the company that this preregistration is related.
The name that identifies your application.

clientId.description: The ID of this client application.

clientSecret.description: The secret of this client application.
